name: A Load of Bull: A minotaur roleplay build
author: francois.demers.4

posts.author: francois.demers.4
posts.content:
I've been surfing the webs checking the new builds the community come up with and, with the lack of shifter builds, all I can say is: What a load of bull!

Speaking of bull, here's a build just for you:

Warning: Thisbuildisforrolepaypurposemainlythereforenotaseriouspvporpvmbuild. Theauthorofthisbuildisnotresponsibleofanystrugglethereadermayhavewhileplayingwiththisbuild.

Race: Human
Alignment: CN
Class: Druid 6, Barbarian 23, Shifter 11

Tune in for more silly shifter roleplay builds!

posts.author: Freaky Grandma
posts.content:
Gotta love your builds. Now Shifter with Barb can actually work well. Had a lot of fun with Hip's "Lord of Terror".
I am curious what else you will come up with. There aren't many shifter builds with Bard which is a pity, because a singing monster just looks so funny. I wonder which combo would be silliest here...
More, please. All possible combos. Maybe there will be one I really want to try.

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
I guess I gotta ask the question : why Shifter 11?

One doesn't really need to go Shifter 11 - one can stay at Shifter 10, as long as it is a feat level and get the goodies!

I normally try for Barb 25/Druid 5/Shifter 10

posts.author: francois.demers.4
posts.content:
Thank you webshaman1 for the idea but Shifter 11 is to get the epic variant of the minotaur shape. Also, the standard variant uses a battleaxe instead of a greataxe which would change WF, IC and EWF feats to comodate with the weapon. The 6th Druid level is used to cap Spellcraft at 40 instead of being down to 20.

To Freaky Grandma: I need to check what shape would benefit bard the best (or the worst since I make roleplay builds anyway). Still, mixing bard with shifter could lead to some good potential.

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content: Mkay, I was just curious.  Makes sense.
